snippet: A close ally of Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban has acquired an ownership stake in a major print and online media company, adding weight to suspicions that the company's closure of the largest opposition newspaper last year was politically m...
lead_paragraph: A close ally of Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban has acquired an ownership stake in a major print and online media company, adding weight to suspicions that the company's closure of the largest opposition newspaper last year was politically motivated.
